div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Vol. XVII, No. 73, March 31, 1906REPORTER'S NOTESThe Church of St. Joseph's in Chicago Heights, Ill.

body.p: Tomorrow morning there will take place the consecrating ceremonies of a Polish church in Chicago Heights, Illinois. The pastor of this new Polish church is Rev. Fr. Grzes. The blessings will be performed by archbishop Quigley. A vast group of Poles from Chicago will be preset at this event. The Rev. Francis Grzes invited the Polonia of Chicago to be present at the consecration of this new Polish Catholic church.
